title: "A" identify this font
content:
Please identify which font this is in my display picture. Its a tough challenge. I've been searching for it since 48hrs now non-stop continously without sleep.

Regards

Ahmed A.
author: ahmedakg

comments.content:
I think there's a good chance this is a custom character. It may have been inspired by the A in ITC Benguiat:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/itc\_benguiat\_1/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426162137/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/itc_benguiat_1/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/itc\_benguiat\_1/")
